alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 3:31AM MST until December 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Pockets of reduced visibility in blowing snow, along with drifting snow. * WHERE...The eastern Magic Valley, including the towns of Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, and Oakley. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around. In locations where a crust does not form on snow, blowing snow will reduce visibility without warning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Those planning travel by motor vehicle should be prepared for blowing and drifting snow in places that remain below freezing.
